full_name: Scenario II: Return to The Midnight Masks

steps.text: Set these cards aside as a separate “Cultist deck.” Shuffle this deck and remove 3 random cards from it, without looking at them. (You shoudl be left with a 5-card Cultist deck.)
Construct the act deck using one of the two copies of Agenda 1a- "Predator or Prey" at random, without looking at their other sides. Remove the other version of Agenda 1a from the game.

Randomly choose one of the two Downtown locations, one of the two Southside locations, one of the two Easttown locations, one of the two Northside locations, one of the two Rivertown locations, and one of the two Miskatonic University locations and put them into play. Remove the other versions of Downtown, Southside, Easttown, Northside, Rivertown, and Miskatonic University from the game. Then, put Graveyeard, St. Mary's Hospital, and Your House into play.
Search the gathered encounter sets for any 1-health [[Cultist]] enemy and spawn it at Southside.
Search the gathered encounter sets for 2 1-health [[Cultist]] enemies. Spawn 1 at Southside and 1 at Downtown.
Search the gathered encounter sets for 3 1-health [[Cultist]] enemies. Spawn 1 at Southside, 1 at Downtown, and 1 at the Graveyard.
